title: Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail: 1812 Links and Resources
body: 1812 Links and Resources         Members of the 1st Royal Scots, Battle of Bladensburg Reenactment, Riversdale Museum, Summer 2009 Photo courtesy of Iain Burns  Links to War of 1812 Bicentennial Activities   Maryland 1812 Bicentennial   Virginia Bicentennial of the War of 1812   Battle of Bladensburg Bicentennial    Eastern Shore War of 1812 Consortium   Upper Bay War of 1812 Bicentennial   Baltimore City War of 1812 Commemoration   Alexandria War of 1812 Bicentennial  National Museum of American History, Smithsonian Institution   Washington, DC War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission  1812 Books, Films and Online Resources -- Compiled by the Maryland War of 1812 Bicentennial Commission Staff   War of 1812 Historical Resources  The Man Who Captured Washington - British General Robert Ross   Music of the War of 1812 in America  Living History Units Fort McHenry Guard    12th United States Infantry Regiment  1812 1st Royal Scots Regiment - Centrex Company of the 1st Royal Regiment, The Royal Scots   Maryland Light Dragoons-Mounted Maryland Militia cavalry unit of 1812 period War of 1812 Sites   Have links to add? Send us an email.
